definition: harmonic (wave with frequency an integer multiple of the fundamental)
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用諧波增量平衡法分析縱橫向耦合梁的諧波響應。

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用諧波增量平衡法分析縱橫向耦合梁的諧波響應。

sentences.english: The circuit can restrain odd order harmonic distortion and common model disturbing signal.
sentences.chinese: 該電路具有對偶次諧波及共模干擾信號具有抑制作用。

sentences.english: This paper proposes the flux mapping method using the higher order harmonics of the neutron equation.
sentences.chinese: 提出用中子方程的高階諧波進行通量擬合的方法。

sentences.english: Harmonic wavelet analysis can extract the singular components in the non-stationary signal effectively.
sentences.chinese: 諧波小波分析可有效提取非平穩信號中的奇異成分。

sentences.english: The synthesizer has a good performance thanks to harmonic phase locking technology and double feedback phase locking technology.
sentences.chinese: 該合成器採用諧波鎖相和雙反饋鎖相技術，性能優良。

sentences.english: The phase is adjusted manually and harmonically with rapid and accurate adjustment.
sentences.chinese: 鏈條送紙，相位手動諧波調節，調整快速而準確。

sentences.english: The main component of experiment equipment of coherent harmonic radiation in Hefei is optical klystron.
sentences.chinese: 合肥相干諧波輻射實驗裝置的主體部分是光學速調管。

sentences.english: We have stated a rule for consonance in terms of the coincidence of harmonics.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經敘述了用諧波的符合來表示諧合的規則。

sentences.english: But the research on harmonic problems has not been reported.
sentences.chinese: 但對這種勵磁機的諧波問題的研究尚未見文獻報道。

sentences.english: Thus, in power supply and consumption system, harmonic control is the problem that needs to be solved urgently.
sentences.chinese: 因此諧波治理已成爲供用電亟待解決的問題。

sentences.english: The basic operating principle of electrostatic harmonic micromotor was presented.
sentences.chinese: 該文介紹了靜電諧波微電機的基本工作原理。

sentences.english: To analyze harmonic accurately is significant to the stability of power system.
sentences.chinese: 準確的諧波分析對電力系統穩定具有重要意義。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the harmonic component of the bridge type current limiter with resistive load.
sentences.chinese: 以阻性負載爲例分析了橋式限流器的諧波問題。
